name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud
description: Paste code, hit deploy, manifest your vibe app into IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite) with website hosting.

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region for the bucket (e.g., us-south).

variables.name: bucket_name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix for the bucket (random suffix added).

variables.name: instance_name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix for the COS instance (random suffix added).

variables.name: website_key
variables.description: Key of the website entry file.

variables.name: vibe_code
variables.description: Paste your HTML (or base64). Leave empty to use the included index.html sample.

variables.name: public_read
variables.description: If true, configure bucket website for public read.

outputs.name: vibe_url
outputs.description: Your live Vibe App URL (public endpoint).

outputs.name: primaryoutputlink
outputs.description: Primary output link for IBM Cloud Projects.
